div.p:
The xxviij dai of September the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv the hail counsale and communite aui
sitly has continuit the aldirman and ballies . that now ar' into thare officis vnto monun
dai next eftir thare hamecuming fra the oist quhilkis ar now to pas to the
asseging of berwik and has delayit the chesing of new officeris vnto the samen
monundai eftir thare hame cuming

the thrid dai of october the yer' forsaid the aldirman consale and communite at the instance of
Alexander rede has consentit and grantit to ressaue quhatsumevir habil person in free
burges and brudir of gild tobe present be him for xxxviij s' pait be him for a gowne
til Richart boyl / And the said alexander has chosin heirto Jhone thomson et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem vndecimo die mensis
octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo quinto

Quo die Johannes ruthirfurd de tarlane miles electus fuit in officium
prepositi Et Willelmus blindsel Thomas de camera magister Andreas cadiou
et Johannes stevynson electi fuerunt in balliuos Ac philippus de Dunbrek
Moricius besat alexander chamer et Duncanus stralogh electi fuerunt in seriendos huius
burgi pro anno futuro / et ad deseruiendum fideliter in dictis officiis ipsorum quilibet
prestitit solitum Juramentum

Statim et in continenti consensum fuit et ordinatum per counsules et fratres gilde quod si seriendi
vel aliquj aut aliquis seriendorum in ministracione officij sui deficiant et de huiusmodi de
fectu legavit conuincantur aut conuincatur licebit ballivis conuictos uel conuictum dicto officio
priuare ac alium seu alios eligere et huiusmodi officium conferre probis personis cum auisia
mento et deliberacione prepositi et communis consilij

Eodem die auctoritate balliuorum per decretum curie respectuatur omnes actiones processus que
in curia capitali debeant deducti et prosequj vsque ad diem lune xvijm diem ministrantis
mensis octobris absque preiudicio cuiuscumque partis

div.head: Appreciatores carnium
div.p:
Walterus thomson Dauid galichtly alexander sanchar' andreas ancroft Jacobus de
Kintor Symon de gardyn Johannes more Johannes glenmaluin andreas Wenton Jacobus
Kennarty Donaldus strathachin thomas de culan andreas goldsmyth henricus bawn'
Dauid spens Walterus de meirnyes Johannes talyour thomas gardnar

Curia Gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta per Johannem ruthirfurd de tarlan militem
prepositum dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem xiiijto die octobris Anno Dominj et cetera / lxxxvto

div.head: Consilium commune
div.p:
Alexander chaumer de murchil
Alexander menyeis
Jacobus lesly
- Robertus blindsel
- Johannes colisone
alexander rede
Dauid menyes iunior
Andreas branche
- Johannes Wormot
- Thomas prat
Dauid mathoson'
Johannes de Knollis
Johannes de cullan
Thomas de fife
alexander chamer filius
- andreas culan senior
- gilbertus vaus
- Dauid menyes senior
- Willelmus de Kintor
- Johannes vaus
- Adam de crafurd
- gilbertus murison
- Andreas murref senior
- Walterus aghneif
- Robertus prat
Ricardus hil pater
Willelmus moyses
Johannes malisson
- Willelmus de gariach
- alexander sanchar
- magnus Wormot
murthacus glenmaluin
- Willelmus hay

The samen dai it was statute and ordanit be the aldirman and counsale / that thir salbe
na ail sald derrer' within this burgh than sex and four' pennyis the galloun vndir
the pane of law

Item the counsale and brethir' of gild consentis and desyris that the Aldirman get ane
lettre of the kingis til eschete al beif and talch that beis schippit or had vteu
the burgh except schippis store and menis vittal And that na fleschar sel talch
bot to free men within the burgh' with Inhibicion in the samen lettre that na man duel
land within the serrefdome of abirdene cal na cattale nor gudis to the mounthe sic
as wol hyde and skyn' vndir pane of eschete of the samyn'

Item that the candil makaris sel for iij d' the pund of candil with gude werk corespon
dand to the talch and weil dryit vndir payn of law

div.head: Gustatores ceruisie
div.p:
In quarterio de greyn de quo Duncanus stralogh est seriendus Alexander huchouson et Willelmus
fet In li crukit quartar Alexander chamer seriendi georgeus Dys' et andreas voket Item pro philippo
Dunbrek seriendo in the evyn quartar / Willelmus sprunt et nicholaius liel Et pro moricio besat seriendo
in quarterio de futy Willelmus modan et fergusius blithe
Curia tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xv die octobris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxv

quo die Stephanus allirdas adiudicatur in amerciamento per confessionem propriam pro iniusta perturbacione
margrete hig emendare eedem ad visum proborum virorum / Et in alio amerciamento pro perturbio
curie minando dictam margretam prout compertum fuit per assisam et cetera

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the xxv dai of october the
yer' forsaid comperit Jhone talyour and in presence of the aldirman ballies and the hail court
of his awne motive and fre wil has gevin quyte and dischargit Sande talyour
his brudiris son of al seruice or prentischip the quhilk he clamit or mycht
clame the said child of / in tymes bigane or fortocum / And has levit him toserve
quhom he likis in tym tocum

Item anent ony gudis that the said Sande talyour has to clame the said Jhone his
eme' of / Robert blindsel forspekar for the child has chosin alexander rede / and the said
Johne talyour has chosin gilbert the vaus' for him / and ar oblist thare handis vp
haldin that is tosay robert blindsel for the child and the said Jhon' for him self / til
vndirly the ordinance of the fornemit personis in the said matir

the consale and diuers' of the merchandis has decretit and counsalit the aldirman and ballies
tomak dew execucion of the kingis lettres direct to thaim for a worschipful knycht ser
William of Knollis commandour of Torfichin vppon certane personis awand til him
certain somez' of money and salmond' in al thingis eftir the tenor of the samyn lettrez

the samen dai be the aldirman consel and brethir of the gild ser Dauid vaus curate of abirdene
and Androw murref eldar war chosin maistiris of the kirk wark of Sanct Nicholace
for this instant yer' and ar sworn todo thare trew diligence in the said office et cetera

The antepenult' day of October' the counsale and communite beand present
for the tym ordanit thre or iiijor personis of the counsale to pas to Alexander
marris wif to ger' hyr deliuer the half commone sele to sele the baillies
commission' / And gif scho makis ony excus' sayand scho has it nocht na
wate nocht quhar' it is / the hale counsale and communite forsaid' has ordanit
to ger' call doune the said half sele and to ger' of new / ane vthir et cetera
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem iiijto die Nouembris anno predicto

quo die hugo tod conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi
meldrum et vxoris eiusdem Et Idem Willelmus cum vxore amerciantur pro perturbio dicti
hugonis / et tenentur emendare ad visum proborum virorum
Ebota elison et Agnes blindsel amerciantur pro perturbio adinuicem

the samyn dai the assise has ordanit and chargit Johne makfersane that in
tym tocum he persew his wif na forthir' quhare evyr scho be / outhir with hir
brudir or sistiris or quhatsumevir vthir place vnto the tyme / that he fynd sufficent
and strenyabil souerty til hir brudir and frendis of hir lif that scho salbe skathles
vndir the payn of bannysing of him fra this burgh et cetera

The vij dai of nouembre the yer' et cetera lxxxv In the court haldin be the ballies in the
tolbuthe of abirdene / Marion' annand Marioune mounk / ellene Duthy / marion'
lilburn and Kitte adeson war chargit be the ballies at the ordinance of the assis'
that in tym tocum / thai by na meil quhil the hour' of ane eftir none / and fra that hour'
furth that nane by bot gif thai mak price of the poke and sek that thai by / and
that nane by vndir condicion as the hiest price of the merket gais vndir pane of viij
s' vnforgevin and secluding oute of the merket for that yeir'

In the court haldin be the ballies in the tolbuthe the viij dai of nouembre Comperit Ri
chart litstar ./ and has gevin quyte and dischargit Androw litstar his brudir of his pren
tischip and seruice in tym tocum / and has levit him toserve quhare he likis

the assis' has assignit til Wat of mernys monunday cum viij dais to preve that he
com souerty condicionaly til Johne of chamer for Johne of achneve that quhen the said John'
of achneve com to the toun and quhat he grantit him awand til Jhone of chamer the
said Wat suld be dettour for And falyeand of the said preif the assis' has ordanit
Wat of mernys topay til the said Jhone of chamer xj s' and demj stane of butyr

The consale has ordanit the Aldirman ser Johne of ruthirfurd to pas to the king with
the townis ansuer' anent the x lastis of salmond' desirit be his hienes And gif he
can put it by that the ton' be nocht chargit with the said salmond for this yer' tocum vnto
michelmes the toune has grantit to doubil his expens' as for xv dais in
sa fer as was wount tobe gevin til expens' of the aldirman

Souerane lord with al maner' of humilite subiection and lawe seruice We Recommend ws
vnto your gracious' hienes plesit the samyn towit that your seruitour our' Aldirman ser John'
of ruthirfurd at the command' of your lettrez has serchit and soucht in al this your
pur' tovne tohaf gottin ten lastis of salmond' / the quhilkis as he can sekirly
schawe to your hienes ar nocht at this tym tobe gottin / for the salmond' of the last yeris
fischingis ar sald and send in flandris and vthir placis as is weil knawyn
Herfor plesit your gude grace tohaf oure comon sele tobynd for ten lastis of
salmond of this next yeris fischingis / quhare it wil plese your hienes tocause
your factouris tosel thame we salbe Redy to accomplis and fulfil your gracious
plesir' and desire / your' hienes gevand ws assignacion' tharfor' to your custummes
of this tovne at a competent price / as our said aldirman sal agre with your hienes /
to quham It wil plese the samyn togif ferme credence with gracious expedicion of
the matiris concerning the comon' gude and weil of this your pur' tovne / sen we ar and
euir salbe redy at the emplesir' and command' of your gracious' hienes quhais maist
nobil serenite conserve our' saluatour' Jhesus writin vndir our seil of causis at
Abirdene the x day of Nouembre
Til our Soueran lord
the king et cetera
Your maist humble and lawly seruitouris and
bedemen the consale and communite of abirdene

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xo die Nouembris
Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxv /

quo die elisabeth vxor Willelmi meldrum amerciatur pro perturbio
hugonis tod / Et ordinavit assisa quod idem hugo quj alias perturbavit et percussit dictum
Willelmum meldrum et vxorem eius / dabit prefato Willelmo pro emenda ij s' et dimidii libre cere
ad lumen Sancti sanguinis . preterea iniuxerit dicto hugonj prepositus quod de cetero de tali de
fectu per ipsum perpertratum non conuincatur sub pena exulacionis ab hac villa pro anno et die

the samen dai William blindsel producit in Jugement before the aldirman and ballies
fyndlau fores and William cryne tobere witnes in the action vndirwritin persewit
be him againis Wilyeam more / quhilkis the gret aith sworn in presence of the said
William more / and particulary examnit before the aldirman / thom of chamer and Jhon'
stevinson twa of the balyeis deponit as eftir folowis that is tosay / fynd
law fores skippar the first witnes Inquirit declarit be his aith that William
more ressavit of William blindselis oute of his schip half a last of
hidis / and how thai war sald he wate nocht / and that Wil more pait him
demj merk flemys for the fracht of thaim And gif Wil more layd ony gudis of
Wilyeam blindselis apon the said schippis bothum . he knawis nocht / bot he
sais he had in the said schip j tvn of wyne / and gret salt / he wate nocht
how mekil and a kyst William cryne secund witnes concordis with the
said fyndlau fores in his deposicion And becaus' William more alle
git that this action was referrit of before til certain persons that is tosay
Thomas prat Androw murray eldar Robert prat and Walter achneve / William blind
sel is content of the fornemit persons / gif thai wil tak this actione to thaim / the depo
sicion of the witnes takin this dai standand in sic fors and effect than as now
tayn in Jugement / and tharto William more has consentit And gif thai wil nocht
tak this matir to thaim / the saidis parties sal cum agane to the court of this burgh
for the finale decision' of the samyn

William cryne Is fundin quyte be ane assis' of the clame of William more of
xij g' for ij eln' of brade clath And the said Wilyeam more is convict be his
awne grant topay iiij s' til Wil criyn within terme of law And gif he can preve
ocht pait to Will crinys wif of the samen some' It salbe allowit

die xvj nouembris anno et cetera lxxxv in presencia Johannis stevynson vnius ballivorum Robertus
stewart in abirnethy constituit Willelmum de abirdour' suum procuratorem ad prosequendum
legittime actionem suam aduersus Johannem vaus burgensem huius burgi pro iniusta detencione
iiijor librarum et iiijor solidorum / et in omnibus aliis causis ipsum concernentibus Et promisit de rato et cetera

the xviij dai of nouember' comperit before the ballies in Jugement / peter skippar of the
densschip that brak on the sandis of balhelvy / and declarit that Jhone the vaus
content and pait him of a certane of towis of the said schip quhilkis he brocht hame
apon his hors

the xxj dai of nouember' In the court haldin be the ballies patrik chavmer was
adiugit to pay til Jhone talyour v s' for ij eln' of quhite clath within terme of law

Item Wat of meirnys is ordanit be the balyeis and the court topay til Johne of
chavmer viij s' within terme of law for the souerty anent Johne of achneve / and this
is tretit be way of composicion becaus' the said Wat falyeit in the production of a
sufficent preif assignit be ane assis' of before to this day
Curia legalis tenta per balliuos de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxviijo die nouembris

quo die alexander talyour conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbio thome gray scissoris extra
ecclesiam Et pro verbis iniuriosis inter thomam glenmaluin seruitorem dicti alexandri et prefatum
thomam gray in ecclesia ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur per assisam deliberare j libras cere
ad lumen Sancti sanguinis Et si ammodo aliquis predictarum preter conuincatur pro tali offensa soluet
xx s' ad fabricam ecclesie / preterea Alexander alanson deuenit plegius legalis pro alexandro talyour et thoma
glenmaluin de indempnitate thome gray Et idem thomas gray inuenit Willelmum portar plegium legalem pro eo quod
alexander talyour et thomas glenmaluin erunt indempnes aliter quam pro viam Juris et cetera

the samyn dai the Aldirman and consale has deliuerit and decretit that gif Alexander of
chavmer aldirman of the yer' bipast be extraexpendit in his compt sa that his
son Alexander of chavmer Abbot of boneacord may nocht get payment of his fee concer
ning his office / than the said Aldirman and consel has grantit and tayn vppon
thame to pay and content him his fee of this instant yere / the said Abbot doand his
dewiteis tharfor as acht and wount was

The last dai of nouembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv / the Aldirman ballies counsale and
communite of abirdene eftir the presentacion perlection and insinuacion of our Soueran lordis
lettrez vndir the signet of the lyon' direct to thame for xiij lastis of salmond / the
said aldirman causit the ballies consail and communite forsaid to entir in the tolbuthe of
the said burgh for expedicion of the said matir The quhilkis riply avisit
and ilkane be thame self thare beand present inquirit / has grauntit at the
request of our soueran lord ten lastis of salmond' of this next yeris fisching
And tharuppon for the payment of the samyn x lastis thare obligacion vndir
thare common seil tobe deliuerit to the aldirman in the name of our soueran lord
the quhilk obligacion was red opinly in presence of thaim al swa that thai be
sickyr and souer of the payment of the said x lastis of salmond that is tosay
xxiiij li' for ilke last of the custumis of the said burgh tobe assignit to
thaim for the payment tharof ay and quhil thai be fullely content and pait for
the said x lastis of salmond And that Inhibicion be made be our soueran lordis
lettres til al his custumaris commptrollaris and al vthiris his officiaris and
auditouris of his chekkar' that na payment be made na rasyt be thaim
fra the day of the date of this present write / quhil the said x lastis of sal
mond be fullely pait and outred ffor the securite of the quhilkis the
aldirman ser Johne of ruthirfurd has bundin him be his hand landis and gudis
tobring sic securite with him fra our souerane lord as forsaid is for the
payment of the forsaid ten lastis of salmond' like as he has command'
of the said burgh tharuppon And for mare securite the said aldirman bal
lies consale and communite has causit ser Robert leis public notar tosubscrive
vndir his signe manuale this present act / dai and place forsaidis
Robertus leis notarius publicus

Burgenses et fratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Johannis ruthirfurd
de tarlan militis Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxvto

Johannes brogane gracia prepositi et quorundam consilij Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde pro v s' eo quod per dei gracium desponsabit filiam Dauidis hil fratris
gilde huius burgi / prestito solito Juramento

Andreas vaus filius quondam Ricardi vaus de many factus fuit liber burgensis
et frater gilde ob paternam libertatem pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

Johannes mounk de consensu prepositi et consilij receptus fuit in liberum bur
gensem et fratrem gilde ad requestam domini Dauidis vaus curati de abirdene
pro v s' datis preposito et prestitit solitum Juramentum

Edwardus top factus fuit liber burgensis et frater gilde de consensu prepositi
et consilij causa paterne libertatis pro v s' prestito solito Juramento

Johannes thomson Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad instanciam
Alexandri rede cuj alias promiss' fuit per prepositum consules et communitatem pro solucione toge Ricar
di boyl / quj quidem Johannes dedit preposito v s' et prestitit solitum Juramentum

Magister Ricardus craufurd recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gil
de pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa ob paternam libertatem prestito solito Juramento

Willelmus gray in methlik Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde ad requestam domini comitis de huntly et patricij gordon' de meth
lik quj prestitit Juramentum solitum

Alexander de garuiach germanus Willelmi de garuiagh factus fuit liber
burgensis et frater gilde pro xxx s' prestito solito iuramento

Johannes andirson germanus Willelmi andirson senioris Recipitur in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde racione paterne libertatis pro v s' datis preposito in alba
bursa prestito Juramento solito

Johannes rogerson filius quondam Rogeri Williamson burgensis huius burgi
receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ob paternam liber
tatem pro v s' in alba bursa preposito datis et prestitit solitum Juramentum

Patricius coben Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde pro xxx s' prestito solito Juramento

Thomas Wodeman apud fethera factus fuit liber burgensis et frater
gilde ad requestam domini comitis de huntly pro v s' datis preposito in
alba bursa / et prestitit solitum Juramentum

Alanus thomson tinctor receptus est in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
gracia prepositi et quorundam consilij eo quod desponsabit filiam burgensis huius
burgi prestito solito Juramento

Jacobus Kennarty Junior gracia quorundam consilij ad instanciam prepositi factus
fuit liber burgensis et frater gilde pro v s' in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

laurencius stringhar communis operarius burgi gracia prepositi et consilij receptus fuit
in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Juramento consueto

Idem laurencius constitutus est decanus omnium aliorum suj operis et artificij
infra hunc burgum
